title: Ayurvedic Breath Support Spray (Eucalyptus + Tulsi)
excerpt: A gentle nasal and airway spray with eucalyptus hydrosol, tulsi extract, and saline to support clearer breathing.
content:
## What Is This Breath Support Spray?
A soothing nasal and airway spray formulated with diluted eucalyptus hydrosol, tulsi extract, and a saline base. Designed to provide temporary clarity and ease during congestion.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Tulsi supports respiratory comfort while eucalyptus provides cooling vapors that clear the nasal passages. Saline moisturizes and reduces dryness.

### Key Benefits
- Promotes clearer nasal breathing.
- Helps ease temporary congestion.
- Refreshes and moisturizes nasal passages.

## Ingredients
- Tulsi extract
- Eucalyptus hydrosol (diluted)
- Saline solution

## Usage Instructions
- Use as per label guidance.
- Do not overuse; consult a practitioner if symptoms persist.

## Packaging
- Sterile pump bottle.

## Safety & Consultation
- Not for chronic sinus issues without medical guidance. Avoid for young children unless advised.

## Why Choose This Spray?
A gentle, plant-based respiratory support tool inspired by Ayurvedic herbs.
